Cost: 0 AcP

Your heroic moments grant others the will to keep fighting. When you spend a Hero Point, you and any allies within 30 feet who can see you regain @Damage[3d6[healing]] Hit Points (@Damage[4d6[healing]] if you are Revered by Radiant Oath). This healing also affects dying allies, even if they cannot see you due to being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious].
